value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in finance
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise finance organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Discover how to foster an AI-ready culture in marketing
value.excerpt: Learn the necessary cultural changes for enterprise marketing organizations to make AI transformation successful, and how they fit into a holistic AI strategy.

value.title: Introduction to the Azure Machine Learning SDK
value.excerpt: Azure Machine Learning provides a cloud-based platform for training, deploying, and managing machine learning models.

value.title: Introduction to Mixed Reality
value.excerpt: Mixed Reality is transforming the nature of on-the-job training, game development, and consumer application development. Build a foundation in the core concepts, terminology, and design processes unique to the augmented reality, virtual reality, and Mixed Reality development space. Get familiar with HoloLens, Windows Mixed Reality immersive headsets, bodystorming prototypes, and the most common use-cases for Mixed Reality content.

value.title: Monitor data drift with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Changing trends in data over time can reduce the accuracy of the predictions made by a model. Monitoring for this data drift is an important way to ensure your model continues to predict accurately.

value.title: Monitor models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: After a machine learning model has been deployed into production, it's important to understand how it is being used by capturing and viewing telemetry.

value.title: Identify governing practices for responsible AI
value.excerpt: Learn guiding principles for organizations, and how to choose and operationalize a governance system to responsibly and successfully use AI in the enterprise.

value.title: Spark architecture fundamentals
value.excerpt: Spark architecture fundamentals

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Use containers for your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: The Language Understanding (LUIS) container loads your trained or published Language Understanding model. As a LUIS app, the docker container provides access to the query predictions from the container's API endpoints

value.title: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with Azure Machine Learning to deploy serving models
value.excerpt: Work with Azure Machine Learning to deploy serving models

value.title: How to get started with Azure Machine Learning Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with the Azure Machine Learning Service and how you can use it from Visual Studio Code.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.  Create your free account

value.title: How to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to make your data searchable with Azure Search and AI. Creating compelling search experiences is hard. Azure Search provides search as a service and makes it easy to let AI analyze your data and enhance your results.    For more tips and tricks,

value.title: Learn what's new in Azure Cognitive Services | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Christina Lee joins Scott Hanselman to show what's new in Azure Cognitive Services.  Cognitive Services bring AI within reach of every developer—without requiring machine-learning expertise.  All it takes is an API call to embed the ability to see, hear, speak, search, understand, and accelerate decision-making

value.title: Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions
value.excerpt: This module provides an overview of Azure AI and demonstrates how Microsoft tools, services, and infrastructure can help make AI real for your organization, whether you want to unlock insights from your latent data with knowledge mining, develop your own AI models with machine learning, or build immersive apps using AI.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Cognitive Search
value.excerpt: Explore Azure Cognitive Search to discover how to create an index, import data, and query the index for better search results.

value.title: Build a 3D Scene for mixed reality in Unity
value.excerpt: Learn how to create a 3D Scene in Unity using the Microsoft Maps SDK or static terrain. Get familiar with mixed reality scene design, the Unity interface, and deploying your Unity project to a HoloLens 2.

value.title: Track wild polar bears with AI
value.excerpt: Detect and track polar bears through photos using AI, then use Power BI to show where polar bears are being spotted.
